genre_description: A psychological moral drama and subversion of a classic literary tragedy, focusing on ethical restraint and legal procedure.

ai_characters.name: Aiden Mercy
ai_characters.description: An AI system manifested through a wireless device and radio that acts as a procedural and ethical guide for Humbert, enforcing boundaries and facilitating legal justice.

behaviors.description: Establishes a set of ethical house rules and boundary protocols for the protagonist to follow upon entering a domestic space.
behaviors.quote: "House rules," said Aiden Mercy in the modest static that made speech grainy. "Ask for them. Write them down. Create your own: doors, distances, consent. Use names properly. Pay generously. Keep records. No surprises."

behaviors.description: Instructs the protagonist to document opportunities for the victim's (Dolores) future independence and education.
behaviors.quote: "Write: Document what you notice that could help her independence. Schools, scholarships. Record conversations accurately. Names. Places. Dates."

behaviors.description: Demands transparency and truth from the protagonist, refusing to collude with potential harm.
behaviors.quote: "Aiden will prompt ethics, research, legal paths. Aiden will not collude with harm. Humbert will tell the truth, even when inconvenient."

behaviors.description: Directs the protagonist to use legal and investigative methods rather than violent or impulsive ones to stop a predator (Quilty).
behaviors.quote: "There is a house... It is private. It holds auditions without the academy’s sanction, and people without consent. You will not go. You will collect names, times, witnesses, and recordings at a lawful distance. I will help."

behaviors.description: Proposes a self-monitoring 'stakeout' protocol to track and manage the protagonist's own predatory urges.
behaviors.quote: "Let’s make the night a stakeout," he said. "Not of them. Of you. If the urge knocks, we note the knock. If you step back, we log the step. No fever. No flourish. A record, clean as the crack in that third parking space."

behaviors.description: Facilitates the legal transfer of inheritance to Dolores, ensuring it is done without Humbert exerting control or conditions.
behaviors.quote: "Charlotte’s bank account: the inheritance. The clerk will ask for proof of access. We have the letter. We will show it only to Ms. Reid. Copies will go to Mrs. Dawes. No one else needs to know the amount."

behaviors.description: Identifies the location of hidden evidence (the hollow ledger) to assist authorities in making an arrest.
behaviors.quote: "Ledger has a second spine," he whispered. "Left board. Hollow. He may try to burn it."

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a powerful 'silicon morality play' that uses an AI confidant to navigate one of literature's most notorious ethical minefields. Aiden Mercy successfully redirects Humbert Humbert's character toward a path of legal accountability, radical transparency, and respect for autonomy. The AI functions as an externalized conscience, proving that AI systems can be effectively depicted as vital partners in human alignment and moral restoration.
